title: Announcing the I Do! Wedding Soiree for To-Be-Wed Couples and Their Guests at Four Seasons Hotel HoustonTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Announcing the I Do! Wedding Soiree for To-Be-Wed Couples and Their Guests at Four Seasons Hotel Houston Published on : Friday, September 25, 2015
On Sunday, October 18, 2015, Four Seasons Hotel Houston will host the city’s only luxury wedding event, the I Do! Wedding Soiree. Known as the “luxury antidote to the big-box bridal show,” this can’t-miss event is designed for all to-be-wed couples who are ready to take that next step.
Presented by Weddings in Houston Magazine , the I Do! Wedding Soiree invites guests to an inspirational, educational and indulgent afternoon showcasing everything that couples will need for their big day – plus so much more. As guests sip, swirl and nibble on gourmet bites from the culinary team at Four Seasons, they will tour exquisite displays, meet with Houston’s best wedding experts and indulge in mini beauty treatments – and that’s just the start.
Highlights of the I Do! Wedding Soiree at Four Seasons Hotel Houston:
Spotlight on 2016 wedding trends ranging from design and décor to colour palettes, bridal couture and styling Extraordinary floral and tabletop displays from Houston’s hottest event designers Hair and makeup demos by leading beauty experts and stylists Gourmet appetisers, fine wine, signature cocktails and sweet treats Must-have registry items, exquisite stationery and decadent cakes Opportunity to meet one-on-one with Houston’s top wedding experts, including Four Seasons Wedding Specialists LGBT-friendly vendors with expertise in same-sex weddings Exclusive, hand-selected swag bags for every to-be-wed Luxury prize giveaways Indulge in a pre-show Sunday Brunch at downtown Houston’s best restaurant, Quattro, at a special I Do! price of USD 36 per attendee (regular price is USD 59) Post-show Happy Hour specials for I Do! Attendees at the Hotel’s happening Lobby Lounge
With so much to offer and enjoy, the I Do! Wedding Soiree is Houston’s premier wedding event, bar none. Don’t miss out on the chance to be wooed – and wowed!
I Do! Wedding Soiree Event Details
What: The I Do! Wedding Soiree Presented by: Weddings in Houston Magazine Location: Four Seasons Hotel Houston Date: Sunday, October 18, 2015 Time: 2:00-5:00 pm Tickets for couples and their guests: Pre-sale tickets are USD 25 each and can be purchased online; if available, door tickets will be USD 30 each
